refnamediv.refpurpose: GInterface for D-Bus objects exporting Telepathy properties

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The Telepathy Properties interface associates a number of named properties with a channel, connection or other D-Bus object. Signals are emitted when the properties or their flags (readable/writable) change.

refsect2.title: TpSvcPropertiesInterface
refsect2.para: Dummy typedef representing any implementation of this interface.

refsect2.title: tp_svc_properties_interface_get_properties_impl ()
refsect2.para: The signature of an implementation of the D-Bus method GetProperties on interface org.freedesktop.Telepathy.Properties.

listitem.simpara: Used to return values or throw an error

refsect2.title: tp_svc_properties_interface_return_from_get_properties ()
refsect2.para: Return successfully by calling dbus_g_method_return(). This inline function exists only to provide type-safety.

refsect2.title: tp_svc_properties_interface_implement_get_properties ()
refsect2.para: Register an implementation for the GetProperties method in the vtable of an implementation of this interface. To be called from the interface init function.

listitem.simpara: A class whose instances implement this interface
A callback used to implement the GetProperties D-Bus method

refsect2.title: tp_svc_properties_interface_list_properties_impl ()
refsect2.para: The signature of an implementation of the D-Bus method ListProperties on interface org.freedesktop.Telepathy.Properties.

listitem.simpara: Used to return values or throw an error

refsect2.title: tp_svc_properties_interface_return_from_list_properties ()
refsect2.para: Return successfully by calling dbus_g_method_return(). This inline function exists only to provide type-safety.

refsect2.title: tp_svc_properties_interface_implement_list_properties ()
refsect2.para: Register an implementation for the ListProperties method in the vtable of an implementation of this interface. To be called from the interface init function.

listitem.simpara: A class whose instances implement this interface
A callback used to implement the ListProperties D-Bus method

refsect2.title: tp_svc_properties_interface_set_properties_impl ()
refsect2.para: The signature of an implementation of the D-Bus method SetProperties on interface org.freedesktop.Telepathy.Properties.

listitem.simpara: Used to return values or throw an error

refsect2.title: tp_svc_properties_interface_return_from_set_properties ()
refsect2.para: Return successfully by calling dbus_g_method_return(). This inline function exists only to provide type-safety.

refsect2.title: tp_svc_properties_interface_implement_set_properties ()
refsect2.para: Register an implementation for the SetProperties method in the vtable of an implementation of this interface. To be called from the interface init function.

listitem.simpara: A class whose instances implement this interface
A callback used to implement the SetProperties D-Bus method

refsect2.title: tp_svc_properties_interface_emit_properties_changed ()
refsect2.para: Type-safe wrapper around g_signal_emit to emit the PropertiesChanged signal on interface org.freedesktop.Telepathy.Properties.

refsect2.title: tp_svc_properties_interface_emit_property_flags_changed ()
refsect2.para: Type-safe wrapper around g_signal_emit to emit the PropertyFlagsChanged signal on interface org.freedesktop.Telepathy.Properties.
